```{r}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  tidy=FALSE,     # display code as typed

  message=FALSE)   

# load packages here
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(mdsr)
library(stringr)
library(robotstxt)
library(tidytext)
```

```{r}
# check permissions ----------------------------------------------------------
songs_url <- "https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~dtompkin/music/list/Best9.html"
paths_allowed(songs_url)
# scrape the table -----------------------------------------------------------
songs <- songs_url |>
  read_html() |>
  html_elements("table") |>
  purrr::pluck(2) |>
  html_table()
songs
# (https://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/mileycyrus/endoftheworld.html)
# urls <- paste0("https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~dtompkin/music/track/", hrefs) 
# clean up the table
```

```{r}
#| label: scraped to usable
songs_clean <- songs |> 
  rename(number = X1
         , artist = X3
         , title = X4
         , time = X5
         , bpm = X6
         , year = X7
         , genre = X8) |>
  select(-X2,-X9,-X10) |>
  filter(artist != "ARTIST")
```

```{r}
# (https://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/mileycyrus/endoftheworld.html)
songs_use <- songs_clean |>
  mutate(# to lowercase
    artist_lwr = str_to_lower(artist)
    , title_lwr = str_to_lower(title)
    # remove spaces
    , artist_l = str_replace_all(artist_lwr, " ", "")
    , title_l = str_replace_all(title_lwr, " ", "")
    )

```
